Name: ticker
Comment: Unique identifier for the stock

Name: datenr
Comment: Sequential integer representation of the date

Name: date
Comment: Calendar date of the data point

Name: open
Comment: The stock's price at the start of the trading day

Name: high
Comment: The highest price the stock reached during the day

Name: low
Comment: The lowest price the stock reached during the day

Name: close
Comment: The stock's price at the end of the trading day

Name: volume
Comment: The number of shares traded during the day

Name: pchange
Comment: Percentage change in closing price from the previous day

Name: dchange
Comment: Change in closing price from the previous day (in $)

Name: yrhigh
Comment: The highest price reached in the past 52 weeks

Name: yrlow
Comment: The lowest price reached in the past 52 weeks

Name: dividend
Comment: Cash distribution per share paid to shareholders

Name: exdivdate
Comment: The date on which a stock starts trading without dividend

Name: peratio
Comment: Ratio of stock price to earnings-per-share

Name: yield
Comment: Annual dividend as a percentage of stock price

Name: avgvolume
Comment: Average number of shares traded over a period

Name: weekbkdate
Comment: Date marking breakdowns into weekly periods

Name: qtrbkdate
Comment: Date marking breakdowns into quarterly periods

Name: yrbkdate
Comment: Date marking breakdowns into yearly periods

Name: ytddate
Comment: Date marking breakdowns within the current year
